trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TypeValidationEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TypeValidationCompleted" /> event of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示處理 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TypeValidationCompleted" /> 控制項之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TypeValidationCompleted> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> class is an optional event that is raised only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.ValidatingType%2A> property is explicitly set to a type other than `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TypeValidationCompleted>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>類別是選擇性的事件，才會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.ValidatingType%2A>屬性明確設定為型別以外`null`。

trans-unit.source: Typically, a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TypeValidationCompleted> event is implemented to perform mask-specific and type-specific validation processing.
trans-unit.target: 通常，處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.TypeValidationCompleted>事件以執行特定的遮罩和特定類型的驗證處理實作。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, general validation is typically performed in the standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> event defined in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> base class.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，一般驗證通常會執行標準<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating>中定義事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>基底類別。
